title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Fundamental concepts of computing, problem solving, algorithms, and programming.

title: Data Structures
description: Implementation and application of basic data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

title: Algorithms
description: Design and analysis of algorithms including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms.

title: Principles of Marketing
description: Introduction to marketing concepts, including customer behavior, market segmentation, and product strategies.

title: Academic Writing
description: Developing skills for academic research writing and critical analysis.

title: Digital Logic Design
description: Boolean algebra, logic gates, combinational and sequential circuits, memory elements, and basic computer organization.
